prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool, chibi proportions with large crystalline flame geometric head with unique tetrahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Tetrahedron. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedron, merkaba patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences. Outfit is unique: dark grey with intensity inspired by Crimson and neutral grey inspired by fire angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with Whirling dervish skirts and divine love sashes with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating Coarse wool for humility, elaborate with pulsing Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and tetrahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with reed flute with Tetrahedron spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor CRALPIR's profile: 'He of bright joy', Aethyr ZIP, Fire element, Tarot Death, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Scorpio, embodying the essence: 'In CRALPIR's presence, despair yields to comfort like the triumphant solace of sunrise after a long night on the battlefield.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool
visual_elements.head_shape: large crystalline flame geometric head with unique tetrahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystalline facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Tetrahedron
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedron, merkaba patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with Whirling dervish skirts and divine love sashes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating Coarse wool for humility
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with reed flute
visual_elements.primary_color: dark grey with intensity inspired by Crimson
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He of bright joy'
profile_data.essence: In CRALPIR's presence, despair yields to comfort like the triumphant solace of sunrise after a long night on the battlefield.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Radiant Dawn; marshals zephyr-bound sentinels.
profile_data.form_description: A phoenix-like crystalline figure emerging from flame-etched geometric planes, representing transformative power of Scorpionic energy and Death card's regenerative symbolism
profile_data.color_reasoning: Crimson represents fire element's passion, golden amber symbolizes divine solar intelligence, pulsing pattern reflects Geburah's dynamic martial energy
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Tetrahedron represents elemental fire, Merkaba symbolizes interdimensional travel and sacred transformative potential
